pingInterval.description: Interval to trigger the ping command in seconds.

pingTimeout.description: Timeout in seconds to pause ping calls after on or off command has been called.

matchers.description: Regular expressions to check stdout data of the shells to determine the current state of the switch.

on.description: Regular expression to check for 'on' state on stdout.

off.description: Regular expression to check for 'off' state on stdout.

startup.description: Command(s) to execute once upon initialization of the accessory.

ping.description: Command(s) to execute when homekit requests a status update or 'pingInterval' is triggered.

on.description: Command(s) to execute when homekit requests to turn the switch on.

off.description: Command(s) to execute when homekit requests to turn the switch off.
